tours.title: Classic tour of Eastern Canada
tours.description: The best travel route in Eastern Canada, ensuring you don't miss any classic sights.

tours.title: First Encounter: Italian Classics
tours.description: A tour around Italy is perfect for first-time visitors or those who want to see all of Italy's classic sights in one trip.

tours.title: Italian Culinary Journey: Classics and Innovation
tours.description: Guided by Michelin regulars, you'll experience the most delicious classic and local Italian cuisine in one go.
